infotexts.entitydescription.touhousprayer: Sprayer that paints Touhou stickers on walls.
infotexts.entitydescription.remiliagear: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood painted the dress in a bright red, hence the name “Scarlet Devil.” .‖color:end‖\n‖color:150,150,150,255‖Note: Look at the healing menu after putting this on!‖color:end‖\n ‖color:gui.green‖+3%‖end‖ Bleeding
infotexts.entitydescription.Remilia_Plus: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The spilled blood painted the dress in a bright red, hence the name “Scarlet Devil.”.‖color:end‖\n‖color:150,150,150,255‖Note: Look at the healing menu after putting this on!‖color:end‖\n ‖color:gui.green‖+3%‖end‖ Bleeding
infotexts.entitydescription.bloodpackB: Just a normal blood bag. They say it’s tastier to vampires, though.
infotexts.talentdescription.demonkingcradle:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖“Remilia’s Outfit+”‖end‖, using ‖color:gui.orange‖B-type Blood (High Quality)‖end‖ gives you:
 Automatic healing of ‖color:gui.orange‖Bite wounds‖end‖.
‖color:gui.green‖+20%‖end‖ ‖color:gui.orange‖Movement Speed‖end‖. 
 Increase ‖color:gui.orange‖Psychosis resistance‖end‖and damage dealt. 

‖color:150,150,150,255‖They say Remilia’s a serious egotist. She loves Type B blood!

Imperishable Night‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Demon_King_Cradle: "This would taste better if I could accompany it with Sakuya’s black tea…”
infotexts.entitydescription.remiliapaint:
A spray can of Remilia Paint for the Touhou Sprayer. No one knows how it works, but it smells of blood, somehow. 
‖color:255,36,0,255‖Remilia lives at the Scarlet Devil Mansion. 
It is a big, red house by a lake in Gensokyo. 
She’s both the oldest and the one in charge.
Imperishable Night‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Gungnier_Spear: ‖color:255,36,0,255‖The afterimage of Gungnir… somehow fed into itself…? (ammo for Gungnir - Civilian Version) ‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmugear: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener and fencing instructor working and living at the Tower of White Jades. She’s half-ghost, half-human, which might explain why she carries two swords. ‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Plus: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖A gardener and fencing instructor working and living at the Tower of White Jades. She’s half-ghost, half-human, which might explain why she carries two swords, though this outfit seems to be stronger. ‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmupaint: A spray can of Youmu Paint for the Touhou Sprayer. No one knows how it works, but you can see something resembling a small spirit moving around. \n‖color:156,158,161,255‖Roukanken's sheath has a cherry blossom flower on top of it.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmusmg: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖"How can Patchouli create something like this in this planet... she really is a genius." - Coalition Scientist‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Youmu_Smgmagazine: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖Having turned ghosts into bullets, this ammo can penetrate most of the armor in Europa. (Can be used in Dreams of the Soul or other SMGs.)‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmuceremonialsword: ‖color:156,158,161,255‖The Roukanken blade is said to have been forged by Yokais and is able to kill ten ghosts in one swing. No one knows if this claim is true, though, as people can’t see ghosts.\n"A memento of Cherry Blossoms."‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.youmuwatermelon: The latest achievement of Hydroponic technology in Europa. It’s mostly water, so don’t expect it to fill you up much.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c1:
"Again at a noisy station, erratic crowds, and this fucking headache..." you think, as you pop through the outpost's airlock

However, as you climb up the ladder and enter the station, a very strange sense of dissonance makes you look behind.

The source of this seems to be a young girl with her eyes closed... as if meditating. Definitely not something you'd expect to see in this place, as this girl looks about 15 years old, her delicate face surpasses the most exaggerated propaganda of Europa Coalition for their leaders, and her silver hair makes you inexplicably think of the light reflected from the ship's porthole. 

After shaking your head and letting go of "that thought", you notice that she wears two sword scabbards around her waist, despite both being empty. 

You can't help but wonder, "what the fuck is such a girl doing in THIS place?"
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.o1: Step closer to have a look at her
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c2:
You are about to approach, but the seemingly unprepared girl raises her head first. 

At that moment, you manage to get a glimpse of a sword ———— different from the boarding axes stained with rusty blood used by security officers, or ceremonial swords decorated with striped ribbons by assistants. This particular sword feels like a weapon that could not be controlled by mere people, but makes you feel it has been honed in countless years of training after being extracted from the coldness of the vast ocean.

For a moment, you feel like you and the outpost you're in have been cut in half in a single strike, making you choke on your own air, even if the scabbards she is wearing are empty. 

"Hello. Do you happen to have a watermelon, please?" 
The girl's voice was just like you imagined it: clear, but with a hint of sonority, like a sharp sword cutting through cherry bloss- wait... watermelon?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3: "I don't blame if you don't know it, it's new here. A kind of spherical fruit, green on the outside, and black stripes on it... Could you help me find one?" The girl makes a somewhat embarrassing request to you. \n\nAfter coming back to your senses ———— the girl in front of you speaks better than you thought.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.o3: Find out if you have anything she wants on you.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c1: You do happen to have a watermelon on you, and the girl seems quite happy. However, she quickly frowns again, as if wondering how to speak. \n\n"Thank you. Truth be told, I lost my way while chasing that damned rabbit, and I don't know where I am now... could you give me a ride? I'll work if you need me to."
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.o1: "It'd be my honor, Miss Youmu Konpaku."
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.o1.c1: The girl looks relieved. You hear a very excited "Thank you!" as you watch her run towards your submarine. But, wait... did she tell you her name?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.o2.c1: You definitely wouldn't allow such a young girl on a trip as dangerous as this, but this is Youmu! How can we not let her join us? Is it even possible that someone would refuse her with such coldness?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2: After some searching, it seems that you don't have any watermelon on you. Looking up, the girl is waiting for your answer.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2.o1: "Sorry, I'm afraid I don't have what you want here. But I can try to find one..."
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2.c1: The girl sighs slightly and stops paying attention to you. "What should I do? Yuyuko sama will..." As you left, you seemed to hear her muttering something. Maybe the outpost vending machines could have one of these fruits?
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin_return.c1: With the sense of dissonance on her, you easily find the girl at the outpost again.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin_return.o1: "Missy, I got the watermelon you asked for..."
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin_return.o1.c2: You wanted to say that, but suddenly it occurred to you that you didn't actually have a watermelon with you.
infotexts.eventtext.youmujoin.c3.c2.o2: "Sorry, I'm afraid I don't have what you want here. Let's go our separate ways."
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Ancient_Temple: There is hardly anything that can be cut off
infotexts.entitydescription.Marisa_Plus: ‖color:255,255,0,255‖Just an Ordinary Magician, though this set of clothes seem to be of higher quality‖color:end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Casket_Of_Star:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Marisa's Outfit+‖end‖: 
Recover faster from‖color:gui.green‖physical injuries and burns.‖end‖ 
The ‖color:gui.green‖damage dealt ‖end‖is increased. 
The‖color:gui.green‖ firerate of all guns ‖end‖is increased.
infotexts.entitydescription.ayagear: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Aya Shameimaru is a crow Tengu who surpasses the rest of Tengu in her speed. She flies around Gensokyo with her camera, and when she finds an interesting event, she leaves after taking a few pictures.\nThough she is not human, she looks basically the same as one.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Plus: ‖color:255,255,255,255‖Aya Shameimaru is a crow Tengu who surpasses the rest of Tengu in her speed. She flies around Gensokyo with her camera, and when she finds an interesting event, she leaves after taking a few pictures.\nThough she is not human, she looks basically the same as one.\nThis particular outfit was tailored for her fast flying and is more resistent to the environment.‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Wind_God_Girl: Read the news to know more about current affairs
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_News: These few pages are perfect to kill some time with, so it usually sells for a good price
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Circular_Fan: These maple-leaf-shaped fans are very popular among the Tengu.
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Maple_Leaves: A few maple leaves. It is said that one fan can blow away a house, two can blow down a big tree, and three can blow away a traveler's cloak. (ammo for Aya's Circular Fan)
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_gear: ‖color:255,81,75,255‖Hakurei Reimu is the maiden of Hakurei Shrine, located in Gensokyo. While mostly residing at the Hakurei Shrine, she sometimes appears in various places within Gensokyo whenever the situation calls for her.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_Plus: ‖color:255,81,75,255‖Hakurei Reimu is the maiden of Hakurei Shrine, located in Gensokyo. While mostly residing at the Hakurei Shrine, she sometimes appears in various places within Gensokyo whenever the situation calls for her.‖color:end‖
infotexts.afflictionname.RedAndWhite: Red and White makes a Hakurei
infotexts.entitydescription.Reimu_Paint: A spray can of Remilia Paint for the Touhou Sprayer.\nWhen visiting the shrine, don't feel pressured to offer money, but you could bring some food for the maiden. \nShaking it slightly makes several metalic sounds... there can't possibly be coins inside... right? [Dev comment: This can is temporarily not working] ‖color:255,81,75,255‖‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Akyuu_gear: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖The Scholar of the Ninth Generation can often be seen at Suzunaan borrowing books. She has an impressive Eidetic Memory, earning her the name of "Memory of Gensokyo".‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Akyuu_Plus: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖The Scholar of the Ninth Generation can often be seen at Suzunaan borrowing books. She has an impressive Eidetic Memory, earning her the name of "Memory of Gensokyo".‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_gear: ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Originally the daughter of a noble family, Mokou became an immortal human after drinking the Hourai's Elixir left by Houraisan Kaguya. Whenever Mokou sees Kaguya, they begin an endless slaughter with one another.‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_Plus: ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Originally the daughter of a noble family, Mokou became an immortal human after drinking the Hourai's Elixir left by Houraisan Kaguya. Whenever Mokou sees Kaguya, they begin an endless slaughter with one another.‖color:end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.Immortal_Human:
While wearing ‖color:255,72,36,255‖Mokou's Outfit+‖end‖: Once per round, after your health reaches zero,‖color:gui.green‖you have an additional 30 seconds of life.‖end‖
 However, it will also temporarily decrease your movement speed and cause damage all around you, causing all your injuries to rapidly recover. 
 When causing ‖color:gui.green‖Phoenix Burn‖end‖, there is an additional ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖damage bonus. 
 Having more enemies around will increase your total damage up to a maximum of ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Sunnu_Scary_Mask: Although it's supposed to be a test of courage, it seems that no one has been scared.
infotexts.entitydescription.gensokyo_divinggear: A magical aura that protects the human body
infotexts.entitydescription.Ether_Divinggear: This diving suit, produced with Patchouli's magic, is based on the idea of mythical beings called mermaids, half-human half-fish individuals that seem to be immune to the pressure of the depths of the ocean.\n While not perfect yet, it's capable of protect the user from water pressure up to 7000 meters.\nThis should go without saying, but after scientists witnessed the ease with which their best diving suits were replicated without Patchouli putting any effort into it, declaring they were left speechless would be underselling it.
infotexts.entitydescription.Power_Point: With these items, replication of the strongest gear is made possible.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Material: A magical substance synthesized from various alien materials. It is said to be named after an album, but what is its purpose? (It cannot be worn on the head)
infotexts.entitydescription.Mc_SnowBall: What the hell is this doing here? Huh? An icicle? What are you talking about?
infotexts.entitydescription.Reiki_Stone: A Stone with weak magical aura, synthesized from special materials. It's very important in the creation of Touhou equipment.
infotexts.entitydescription.Spiritual_Water: Water with extremely weak magical aura. It can extract the traces of magic left behind in Europa's water, so it's an easy refill method.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reiki_Dust: Magic materials obtained from ordinary materials through irreversible rituals. They dissolve in water.
infotexts.entitydescription.Reiki_Dust_Caking: The product of Reiki dust after preliminary processing. It's not soluble and has magical properties. Somehow.
infotexts.entitydescription.Remilia_Doll: It can carry Remilia Paint. When held, it can slowly heal injuries.\n When held, right-clicking can double the effect.
infotexts.entitydescription.Maoyu_Duffel_Bag: The soft shell left behind after the Kedama's spirit departs.\n Eliminating Kedamas is difficult, as their spirits keep wandering in the form of duffel bags. Patchouli claimed to be "working" in a solution, but she just sleeps through the days.
infotexts.entitydescription.Plant_Essential_Oil: This essential oil extracted from plants can be used as Alchemy material and medicine to treat some common injuries.\nIt is said that the recipe came from a place called House of Eternity.
infotexts.entitydescription.Europa_Infusion: This infusion is obtained through complex processes has excellent magical effects. It can treat common injuries and strengthen the body.\nIt is said that the recipe came from a place called House of Eternity.
infotexts.entitydescription.Gilead_Branch_Seed: This mysterious plant grew on Europa at an unknown time, Patchouli determined that it may be a failed product of a mysterious Laboratory.
infotexts.entitydescription.Gilead_Branch: A branch that splits and falls during the autumn. It has certain medicinal value, but it needs complex processing to extract the key elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Balm_Of_Gilead: This ointment made by magic process through Gilead branchs and plant essential oils has powerful therapeutic effect, but pay attention to its use. Improper application might lead to rapid death.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cinnamon_Incense: A piece of incense of unknown origin circulates in a small amount in the market and can relieve the body and mind for a full 24 hours after its ignition. However, according to Patchouli, this seems to be a rather stupid usage.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Peach: This peach of unknown origin looks sweet and tempting. Every time you see it, you wonder what effects it may have, if any.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hakkero: This is a Mini Hakkero with an octagonal shaped appearance, with an Eight Trigrams pattern, and a hole in the middle. Seems something must be inserted for it to work properly.
infotexts.entitydescription.StarDanmu: Patchouli says it's an important piece of the Mini Hakkero. She also modified the formula for this item slightly to make it compatible with charging stations. Talk about QoL!
infotexts.entitydescription.Stardust_Reverie: From the appearance alone, looks like Star Barrage with a different color.
infotexts.entitydescription.Fake_Hakkero: A poor imitation of Hakkero, but it imitates it nonetheless.
infotexts.entitydescription.Homing_Amulet: A stack of amulets that seemingly contain magical power, though no one seems knows how to use them. Patchouli says that adding magic materials can get it to work, though scientists are unsure of what she meant.
infotexts.entitydescription.Freeze_Icicle_Fall: A large piece of ice overflowing with magic. Wait... is that a frog? (Rechargeable in water)
infotexts.entitydescription.Blunderbuss: Both a lunar relic and an unstable mess. Might cause wounds to the user and seems to operate with other lunar relics.
infotexts.entitydescription.Mind_Bullet: A lunar relic of unimaginable power.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lunatic_Bullet: A lunar relic said to be capable of bringing God himself to his knees.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Gungnier: "And as Odin pointed his spear to the skies, even Ymir, Útgarða and the mightiest of warriors were obliterated, helpless to do anything against his might."
infotexts.entitydescription.Mokou_Flamer: A tool that can produce a vigorous flame even in the icy cold of Europa.
infotexts.entitydescription.Phoenix_Tail: Thanks to Patchouli, mass-producing the Phoenix's Tail has become affordable.\n Recently acclaimed in the immortality industry as a convenient alternative to searching for the Elixir of Life.\n It is more convenient to entrust one's life to these inexpensive pharmaceutical products.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hisou_Sword: By using the Sword of Hisou, one can accurately strike the opponent's weak point.\n Only a celestial being can wield the Sword of Hisou.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sakuya_Knife: Lightweight weapons that are easy to carry and throw.
infotexts.entitydescription.youmuceremonialsword2: This ancestral bloodline relic can only be wielded by the Konpaku family and can sever confusion. When asking Patchouli what this means, all she did was sigh audibly and say "You're a big bunch of incompetents."
infotexts.entitydescription.Thousand_Needle_Ammo: Those who do not comply will swallow a thousand needles. (Chaingun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Phoenix_Wings_Ammo: In the middle of flames as hot as the sun, the Phoenix rises from the ashes. (Pulse Laser Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Milky_Way_Ammo: The star sand is colorful and gorgeous. (Coilgun Ammo)"
infotexts.entitydescription.Yin_Yang_Spirit_Orb: No, but seriously, where's the orb!? (Railgun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Marisa_Broom: ‖color:255,255,0,255‖This broom made by the Ordinary Magician can somehow propel its user through water. It's so handy, you can even use two at the same time!‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Power_Bank: A charging bank working with unknown principles. It's been shorting out and leaking electricity due to Aya's refusing Patchouli's help. It can still power most batteries, though.
infotexts.entitydescription.Nitori_Backpack: The backpacks of the Kappa can hold many items while also having other wonderful functions, even withstanding water pressure up to 3600 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kappa_Backpack_Plus: Although the capacity of the upgraded version of the Kappa's backpack has not increased, Patchouli has imbued a powerful magic in it that can protect users to a certain extent, and even resist water pressure up to 6000 meters.
infotexts.entitydescription.Kappa_Miningdrill: The mining tools of Kappa have many advantages, such as portability, ease of operation, durability and so on. Unfortunately, batteries rarely last longer than a few seconds when using this tool.
infotexts.entitydescription.Illness_Recovery_Charm: A healing talisman from the Moriya Shrine. (Headset Slot)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Base_Metal: This magical metal can be used for the synthesis of basic materials.\nPatchouli's insistence has led to the Europa military officially adopting this metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.Mu_Alchemical: A bottle of purified Wood elements, an excellent alchemical product.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Altar: A table prepared for magic rituals. (Press E to pick up.)
infotexts.entitydescription.Alchemy_Table: A table prepared for alchemy, capable of performing various complex alchemical operations. (Press E to pick up)
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.empty.infotext: Insert magic materials for magical reactions. Please refer to the 'Patchouli's Manual' for usage instructions.\n (Tip: The icons of magic materials have corresponding alchemical symbols.)
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Research.Infotext: The stages of alchemy for transforming substances. With Patchouli's guidance, this step can now be easily completed on the alchemy table. (Tip: The icons of magic materials have corresponding alchemical symbols.).
infotexts.Alchemy_Table.Combine.Missingitem: Mixed with base metals and infused with various materials of different properties to achieve alchemical transformation. (Tip: The icons of magic materials have corresponding alchemical symbols.).
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reimilia_Weapons: The ability to manipulate the degree of control over one's destiny.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bai_Lou_Swo: This ancestral bloodline relic can only be wielded by the Konpaku family and can sever confusion. When asking Patchouli what this means, all she did was sigh audibly and say "You're a big bunch of incompetents."
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Bai_Lou_And: Konpaku Youmu is a master of dual-wielding, and both her swords have very unusual uses. Of course, both swords can also be used for ordinary slashing.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Marisa_Hakk: The ability to manipulate different levels of magic.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Side_Effect_: The rejection caused by the body's immune system makes the Reiki inside you become chaotic.
The situation is getting worse, and you feel sharp pains coming from inside your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Reiki_Pressure: The unfriendly Reiki destroys your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Essential_Oil_Appl: The injury at the injured position has been relieved, but the pain is difficult to dissipate.
Essential oil with special properties covers the injured position to help recover.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Yummy_Peach: The deliciousness of peaches can only be known by tasting them, savor every bite!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Phoenix_Burn: The scars left by being burned by Mokou's flames always give people a false sense of invincibility.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Aura_Strip: When your Aura is forcibly taken away, you feel that your physical condition has inexplicably deteriorated a lot.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Resurrection: It's just an unremarkable everyday routine.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Lost_Dream: You have found that your past dreams are gradually fading away, and you can no longer remember them, resulting in a decline in your physical condition.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Elements_Book: A magic book containing records of elemental conversion and combination, able to quickly switch between elements at a moment's notice. Patchouli explained that only magicians with years of practice can use its full power. \n(Elemental Generation requires a Philosopher Stone. [Imitation works.] Elemental Generation will remove the original content.)
infotexts.entitydescription.Kanameishi_Cannon: Whether creating an earthquake or stopping it, only the Hinanawa clan can do it. (Railgun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Immortal_Moon_Smoke: Reach for the Moon, Immortal Smoke
infotexts.talentdescription.Casket_Of_Star:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Marisa's Outfit+‖end‖: 
Recover faster from‖color:gui.green‖ physical injuries and burns.‖end‖ 
Increase total damage caused by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Increase firerate by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ 
The first time you open a shipwreck container, there's a 15% chance of finding a‖color:gui.green‖ Magic Book.‖end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spell_Book: A book detailing all kinds of magic. Take the time to study it, and you'll gain very important knowledge.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Veil: A veil designed by Patchouli for the situations that call for its usage. Improves the user's affinity for magic and resists pressure up to 8000 meters. \nUnfortunately, Marisa interrupted Patchouli's magic incantation and as a result, the veil has a lack of physical defense and it makes using electrical items much harder.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Veil02: A veil designed by Patchouli for the situations that call for its usage. Improves the user's affinity for magic and resists pressure up to 8000 meters. \nUnfortunately, Marisa interrupted Patchouli's magic incantation and as a result, the veil has a lack of physical defense and it makes using electrical items much harder.
infotexts.afflictionname.Mokou_Weapons: The Immortal Guide of the Bamboo Forest
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Mokou_Weapons: A dissipated soul cannot be brought back to life. However, hers is immortal. The universe won't allow her soul to find another vessel, but she doesn't need to find one. Her soul will always create a new vessel for her, no matter what.\nThis doesn't mean she's not hungry or in pain, though.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Marisa_Weapons: A girl whose destiny is to be a magician who lives away from the crowds. Her weapon is magic, and her life is a game.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_De: You feel as if undercurrent magic is surging through your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Elements_Bu: You feel as if healing energy is coursing through your body.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_1: No breathing difficulties or symptoms at all. Better control the situation while you can.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_2: Scratchy throat, cough, and breathing becomes slightly difficult. Exacerbation is about to happen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_3: The pain and symptoms are worsening rapidly. Coughing is very painful, and you can barely breathe.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Asthma_4: Gradually recovering. If the symptoms are not treated, your condition will worsen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Budesonide_: Windpipe inflammation is subsiding and the asthma symptoms are relieving.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Budesonide: A drug for treating Asthma. Won't cause side-effects if used correctly.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_MEID:
A potion that temporarily strengthens the body. It might bring long-term strengthening after use.
This is the result of Patchouli's research in order to adapt her body to Europa's environment. 
Some say it's like being used as a puppet, as if their body stopped belonging to them. 
"No, I'm not complaining, I'm just saying that it might be uncomfortable for some." - Test Subject#3
infotexts.entitydescription.Cinnamon_Branch: This mysterious branch appeared in Europa at some point, and has become popular because of its unique pleasant smell.
infotexts.entitydescription.Cinnamon_Branch_Seed: Obtaining and caring for this seed and its sprout is said to be very difficult. It's also said to have a very low yield, though the smell of its branches are more than worth it.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hyouibana_Dream: Using this will let another character possess you and obtain the corresponding talents and abilities. (Weakened effects)
infotexts.entitydescription.Huo_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified fire elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Tu_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified earth elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Jin_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified gold elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Mu_Alchemical: A bottle of excellently purified water elements.
infotexts.entitydescription.Yang_Alchemical: Don't shake the bottle unless you want to witness the unrivaled power of the nucleus of the sun.
infotexts.entitydescription.Yin_Alchemical: Just staring at the contents can give you peace of mind.
infotexts.entitydescription.Seven_Elements_Alchemi: Although an imitation, its magical capabilities are still working.

The structure and principles of such a legendary creation are beyond the understanding of even the finest of Europa's scientists, but for Patchouli, this is just an ordinary item.\nIts energy can regenerate as long as it's not being supressed by the icy deep sea.
infotexts.entitydescription.Byproduct_Alchemical: Just garbage leftover from alchemy, though a skilled alchemist wouldn't let this happen in the first place.
infotexts.entitydescription.Baka_Horn: Doesn't seem any different from clown horns, but the sound is rather unique.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Royal_Flare: "Struggle all you want. In the end, not even the strongest of winters can resist the scorching sun."
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Silent_Selene_A: The cold silent moonlight stares into the distance every broken night. (Chaingun Ammo)
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Royal_Flare: Your body is as hot as the the very sun itself, and you feel like your entire body is melting from inside out.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Silent_Sele: Your body is as cold as the Boomerang Nebula, and you feel like even the slightest of movements will break your entire body apart.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Magic_Destruction: The faint magic power in your body was completely destroyed and your ability to move normally is severely impaired.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Rib_Injury: Seems like a part of your rib is missing.
infotexts.entitydescription.Hompson_Contender: A handgun with a long history. Rumors say it's been taken after the death of a certain mage that could control time within his body, now has a strange bunny smell.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Origin_Bullet: These bullets for the Contender have been obtained through complex and incredibly painful magical processes. It is said they target a mage's mana, spiraling it out of control and making it forever useless. \nBeing grazed by just one of these bullets is enough to bring a mage's power to an end, and no one is excempt from this rule. Not even Patchouli.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Reiki_Stability: This medicine uses the most efficient method to treat spiritual energy disorders. Might cause addictions.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Foul_Potion: A poison made from alchemical byproducts.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Reiki_Stabi: The severe pain in your body is midly alleviated.
The severe pain in your body has almost faded away.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Apple: Fortunately, this was harvested in time, preventing it from becoming a bad apple. Truly one of the fruits ever.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Golden_Carrot: A lucky charm. Also good if you need food saturation.
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_gear: ‖color:120,75,100,255‖The mage of the Scarlet Devil Mansion's underground library. She has spent most of her life researching and developing new magic, creating books with specific instructions to recreate the magic. An indisputable genius. ‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_Plus: ‖color:120,75,100,255‖The mage of the Scarlet Devil Mansion's underground library. She has spent most of her life researching and developing new magic, creating books with specific instructions to recreate the magic. An indisputable genius. ‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.talentdescription.Knowledge_And_Solitude:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Patchouli's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
As your health gets lower, increases the affliction rate of ‖color:gui.yellow‖Asthma‖end‖. 
Swimming speed increased by ‖color:gui.green‖60%‖end‖ 
Running on land becomes impossible and walking speed is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ 
Maximum HP decreased by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ 
Increase skill gain speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ 
Increase the effectiveness of the five elements by ‖color:gui.green‖300%‖end‖ 
Increases the damage of Spiritual Pressure by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Become more susceptible to injuries and blood loss.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.The_Still_Library: She looks just like a normal human. A slim body and pale skin. Her asthma and anemia limits her abilities somewhat.
infotexts.afflictionname.Patchouli_Weapons: The Witch of the Scarlet Devil Mansion
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Patchouli_Weapons: Patchouli is a good friend of Remilia. They'll ocassionally nickname each other and drink tea together.
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_gear: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖As a member of the Hinanawi clan, she can control keystones to create or stop earthquakes, creating landslide disasters and even shake the foundation of Gensokyo itself.‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_Plus: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖As a member of the Hinanawi clan, she can control keystones to create or stop earthquakes, creating landslide disasters and even shake the foundation of Gensokyo itself.‖color:end‖\n(Contains a built-in scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Tenshi_Hat: ‖color:5,105,195,200‖"It would look too boring if was just a plain hat, so I added some peaches to it."‖color:end‖
infotexts.talentdescription.TenshiTalent:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Tenshi's Outfit+‖end‖: 
Being hit with a melee attack will cause the enemy to run away for a short duration. 
Increases the effect of Temperament Stripping by ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖. 
Increases the resistance to Temperament Stripping by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖. 
After eating a Java Apple, greatly increases damage resistance for ‖color:gui.green‖15s‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.The_Daughter_Of_He: The next in line to be the Emperor turned out to be a small girl. Red pupils and long blue hair. She's often seen wearing a black hat with edible peaches.
infotexts.afflictionname.Tenshi_Weapons: Scary Heavenly Beings Away From Their World
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Tenshi_Weapons: Although Tenshi doesn't have the character of an Emperor, she does have the qualities of one. Her body is so strong that not even a sword can cut her, and her body is a deadly poison to monsters.
infotexts.talentdescription.Innocent_Treasures:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Tenshi's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Swimming speed is increased by‖color:gui.green‖100%‖end‖. 
Movement speed is increased by‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. 
Firerate is increased by‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. 
Skill gain speed is increased by‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. 
If a crewmate dies, you will not die from injuries for the duration of the round.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Magic_Boost: Your mana pool feels botomless and can be spent nigh infinitely.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sleepless_Nightmar: Otherwordly Nightmares have destroyed your mind and your body is much weaker.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Weakness: You feel dizzy and on the border of fainting.
infotexts.entitydescription.Marisa_Star_Bottle: The starlight harvested over time gets highly compressed and then stored. This results in an impossibility to launch bombardments and can only be used for large-scale starlight magic. It feels like it takes forever to accumulate its power. \n"Hey, careful with that! You know how hard it is to collect star power under this freezing sea!?" - Marisa
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Spell_Tutorial: A magic book tailored to beginners.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Flour: With help from Patchouli's knowledge and Kappa technology, Europans have access to some new basic crops. This flour comes from something called "wheat", and is mostly used to make delicacies which Patchouli claims are commonplace on Earth.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Fullmoon_Dumpli: Soft and sweet treat, widly popular with kids.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Fullmoon_Cake: Because of its special significance and appearance, the name "mooncake" was given to it. It has many different flavors which are topic of heated discussion. If you see a blue-haired dragon girl wielding red and black swords, this may just win her over.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Beer: A rare drink here in Europa. It's said to help with heartbreaks, but has become nigh impossible to attain as of lately. "Yuugi! YUUUUGIIIIIIII! Bring me more, moooooooooreeeee!" - Unnamed Japanese Goblin.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Winchester: An ancient earthen weapon, improved by the Kappas. Powerful and compatible with all shotgun ammo. Be mindful of your own skills, as wielding this without the necessary proficience might lead to terrible backlash.
infotexts.entitydescription.Exorcism_Bullet: Shotgun shells made of substances that monsters and yokais are afraid of. Causes increased damage to everything that is not human. Due to its special nature, they can only be used on the Kappa's Winchester.
infotexts.entitydescription.Fire_Element_Book: Disposable magic book imbued with magic. Perfect for novices.
infotexts.entitydescription.Water_Element_Book: Disposable magic book imbued with magic. Perfect for novices.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Concentrated_En: Due to Tenshi's strange request, this weapon made by the Kappas was wildly different from an ideal keystone, but its function of launching them satisfied her. The only volunteer to test this weapon disintegrated after using this while underwater.
infotexts.entitydescription.Lightning_Kanameishi: Under special conditions, a keystone energized by electricity can be used as either an energy supply for the Concentrated Arc Emitter or for charging batteries. "This is unsulated... right?" - Deceased volunteer
infotexts.entitydescription.Patchouli_Doll: Place any bottled element in the doll and it'll heal injuries as long as you hold it. Right-clicking doubles the effect. \nMukyu!
infotexts.talentdescription.Talents_Magician_Prima: Increase skill gain speed by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and repair speed by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖
Add ‖color:gui.green‖5‖end‖ points to all skills. Unlocks the Full Moon Dumpling and Mooncake recipes.
Increase swimming speed by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖, physical resistance is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖
After completing Lair clearing, Hunting, Cargo and Escort missions, you'll receive ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ more experience.
After completing a round with nobody dying, obtain a ‖color:gui.orange‖Ether-layered Metal‖end‖.
Gradually increase your firerate, damage, swimming and walking speed up to ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ depending on your Magic level.
Damage dealt to non-humans is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ and damage caused to non-hostile creatures is reduced by‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖.

You become ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖ more resistant to being ragdolled by water pressure and your maximum health increases by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖. Unlocks the Exorcising Winchester and Pellets of Exorcism recipes.‖color:gui.orange‖退魔圣焰‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖祓魔霰弹‖end‖。
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Banquet: After every round, if no crewmates died, everyone's ‖color:gui.yellow‖physical damage, burns, blood loss and Reaper's Tax‖end‖ is mildly cured.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Hermit: When attacked, there is a ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ chance of reducing ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ of the damage of the attack.
infotexts.talentdescription.Enter_Gensokyo: Resistance to Magic Destruction increases by ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖. Repaired equipment becomes more durable, but the quality of your crafting decreases by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ level.
infotexts.talentdescription.Izakaya: Resistance to drunkeness increases by ‖color:gui.green‖80%‖end‖. Unlocks ‖color:gui.orange‖Beer‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.Gensokyo_Divinggear_Un: Gain ‖color:gui.green‖3‖end‖ points to all skill at the end of the round. Unlocks ‖color:gui.orange‖Gensokyo Diving Gear‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Spell_Card_Recycle_Unl: Selling value of bottled elements is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖75%‖end‖. Unlocks much cheaper ‖color:gui.orange‖Royal Flare and Silent Selene‖end‖ recipes.
infotexts.talentdescription.Magic_Breakthrough: Increases the quality of all crafted items by ‖color:gui.green‖1‖end‖ point while wearing Marisa+/Patchouli+/Flandre+ outfits.
infotexts.talentdescription.Foul_Potion_Unlocked: Debuffs you apply have their duration increased by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. Poisons you apply are‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖ stronger. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖Foul Potion‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.Touhou_Buff: Buffs you apply have their duration increased by ‖color:gui.green‖30%‖end‖. Gain ‖color:gui.green‖40%‖end‖ poison resistance.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hermes: Increases attack damage, movement speed and damage resistance by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖Philosopher Stone‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.Traveling_Magician: After every round, if no crewmates died, obtain ‖color:gui.orange‖1 Magic Book‖end‖. Crewmates who have less than 6 levels will gain skill points ‖color:gui.orange‖20%‖end‖ faster.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Release: Become immune to water pressure, but the damage caused by Spiritual Pressure is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mana_Convergence: Swimming speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖，but resistance to Spiritual Pressure decreases by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖.
infotexts.talentdescription.Power_Point_Efficient_: Your crew is able to accept one extra mission, and reputation gained increases by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. You can now drag creatures at full speed. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖ P Point (Efficient)‖end‖ recipe.
infotexts.talentdescription.MEID_Unlocked: Damage caused increases with the number of enemies around, while damage received decreases, up to ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖ respectively. Unlocks the ‖color:gui.orange‖Maid's Strengthener‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Origin Bomb‖end‖，‖color:gui.orange‖Concentrated Arc Emitter‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.orange‖Electric Keystone‖end‖ recipes.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Aya: Movement speed and experience gained after each round are increased by 20% and 25% respectively.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Marisa: Increase damage dealt by 5%. Mildly increase resistance to normal and acidic burns.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Mokou: Increased resistance to Phoenix Burn. Recover faster from burns and physical wounds.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Reimu: Increases swimming speed by 20%. Increases walking speed by 10%. Increases skill gain speed by 50%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Remilia: Highly increases resistance to Husk infection and recovery from blood loss.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Youmu: Increases ground speed by 10%. Increases melee damage by 25%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Patchouli: Increases swimming speed by 25%. Increases skill gain speed by 25%. Medical items and buffs are 10% more efficient when used on you. Increases Mukyu chances by 5000%.
infotexts.talentdescription.Hyouibana_Tenshi: Increases resistance to Temperament Stripping and recover faster from it. Increases maximum HP by 10%. Further increases Java Apple's effects.
infotexts.talentdescription.Life_And_Death_Half_Ha: While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖"Youmu's Outfit+"‖end‖, melee damage ‖color:gui.orange‖‖end‖ dealt is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖, and ‖color:gui.orange‖movement speed‖end‖ is increased by‖color:gui.green‖36%‖end‖. \nWhile holding the ‖color:gui.red‖Hakurouken‖end‖ and ‖color:gui.red‖Roukanken‖end‖, you will receive a significant damage bonus and further increase your movement speed.
infotexts.loadingscreentip: Try Kyushu Arsenal and the T.S.M. missions!
Buying materials is usually faster than trying to craft them from zero.
Some materials are particularly expensive, but their alchemical efficiency is quite high.
infotexts.talentdescription.Savant:
While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Akyuu's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
After completing ‖color:gui.orange‖any mission‖end‖，receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Symposium of Post-mysticism - Europa Edition‖end‖. 
After completing ‖color:gui.orange‖any mission without casualties‖end‖，receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition‖end‖. 
‖color:gui.red‖Reading [Symposium of Post-mysticism - Europa Edition] or [Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition] will provide NO effects to yourself.‖end‖ 
After completing a round, receive an additional ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ experience. 
Skill gain speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖100%‖end‖ 
Effectiveness of healing effects is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Crafting and Deconstructing speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Movement speed is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ and maximum health is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖35%‖end‖ 
Melee damage is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ 
Rate of fire is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ 
Combine "Symposium of Post-mysticism - Europa Edition", "Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition" and "Aya's News Report" into ‖color:gui.red‖"Historic Records of Gensokyo"‖end‖ at the processing table. 
Reading this new book will give you all the effects.
infotexts.entitydescription.Symposium_Of_Post_Myst: Wisdom, courage and benevolence are the most important virtues. Let them be gathered here.
infotexts.entityname.Perfect_Memento_In_Strict_Sen: ‖color:193,204,65,255‖Perfect Memento in Strict Sense - Europa Edition‖color:end‖
infotexts.entitydescription.Perfect_Memento_In_Str: An abandoned world where humans don't record history. Humans are afraid of monsters and can't understand their true nature.\nIf we could better understand monsters, create countermeasures and avoid dangerous places, we could live without fear.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Europa_Customs: Both worlds are undergoing tremendous change.
infotexts.talentdescription.Mysterious_Mountain:
While wearing ‖color:gui.orange‖Aya's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Swimming speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖+50%‖end‖ 
After completing any mission, receive ‖color:gui.orange‖Aya's News Report‖end‖, if ‖color:gui.orange‖Medical and Helm‖end‖ levels are over 70，receive an additional ‖color:gui.orange‖Press Card‖end‖. 
While in dry environments, gain ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ increased movement speed, ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖ skill gain speed and ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ attack speed. 
When a crewmate is within 20 meters of you, you gain ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖ additional experience. 

‖color:150,150,150,255‖"Huh? My job? Well, as a journalist, I like to record interesting events. I don't really post news regularly, at most 5 times a month. I don't post many things either, but they are of quality! At least the inhabitants of Gensokyo can enjoy it alongside a cup of tea."
infotexts.entitydescription.Aya_Press_Card: Aya's proof of being a reporter. Can be used at outposts.
infotexts.entitydescription.Scarlet_Devil_Mansion: Looks like it's burning, but it's not fire. (Chaingun Ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Precious_Metal: A precious magical metal, product of third stage alchemy. Used in important syntheses, this metal has an efficient elemental conversion.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Potion_Pu: A magical potion capable of curing alien infections and kill specific lifeforms, such as symbiotes.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Cyber_Homing_Am: Through the combination of magic and technology, the Kappas and Patchouli sacrificed some firerate in exchange of greater power and a rechargeable system.
infotexts.entitydescription.Magic_Pouch: A magician's best friend, this magic bag of materials can increase the output of the user's magic power with a magic veil and allows for easy carry of elemental bottles.
infotexts.entitydescription.Camellia_Hair_Accessor: A beautiful hair accessory, made with real flowers.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Aya_Maple_Film: An old piece of film, but of exquisite craftmanship. With the help of magic materials, it can freeze enemies.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Seed: "What do you mean growing sunflowers is impossible here? Do you even know who I am?" -Kazami Yuuka
infotexts.entitydescription.Nue_gear:
‖color:90,80,100,255‖When she sees other people absorbed in their activities, she can't help but to mess with them.
Having lived leisurely underground, she emerged to the surface after troubles with some geysers.

A certain community claims her "Nuenis" is amazing.‖end‖
(Built-in Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Nue_Plus:
‖color:90,80,100,255‖When she sees other people absorbed in their activities, she can't help but to mess with them.
Having lived leisurely underground, she emerged to the surface after troubles with some geysers.

A certain community claims her "Nuenis" is amazing.‖end‖
(Built-in Scanner)
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Petal01: Petals that are somehow very sharp. Handle with extreme care.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Petal02: Very light petals. They feel weightless.
infotexts.entitydescription.Sun_Flower_Petal03: These petals vibrate slightly. You can feel them twist slightly when you touch them.
infotexts.afflictionname.Touhou_Magic_Potion_Candy: A magic potion that can heal wounds. Copious amounts of sugar were added to mask the terrible original flavor. Because of this, it's very popular with kids.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Laevatein: A massive sword that always burns stronger than the sun, no matter what.\nUsing this sword consumes the lifeforce of the user. Once lifeforce consumption reaches 100%, death is certain. \n"Ice cream? For me? Thanks." - Unknown
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mysterious_Pear: Mysterious pearl that exudes a strange aura. You feel it could enhance powers when you hold it.\nWhen you look closely, it looks like there's a lake inside, with something that looks like a head poking out of it.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Eternal_Night_B: An imitation of Eirin's bow, its power depending of the arrows used. An imitation is just that, at the end of the day.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Magic_Metal_Arr: These arrows made of magic metals can restrict movement of its target. Assuming it hits, anyways.
infotexts.entitydescription.Piece_gear: A subordinate of Hecatia, who looks like loves meeting fairies and playing with them.
infotexts.entitydescription.Piece_Plus: A subordinate of Hecatia, who looks like loves meeting fairies and playing with them.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Starbow_Break: "What do you mean there's a safe spot?" (FLAK Cannon ammo)
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Mysterious_Pear: There seem to be some weird pearls out there or something. Honestly? I don't fucking know anymore.
infotexts.entitydescription.Salvage_Mysterious_Pea: 上面记录了重要数据，也许是调查异变的重要线索。
infotexts.entityname.Touhou_Missions_Collection_Nu: Touhou Mission Log: Supernatural Ripples and a "Long Night"
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Missions_Collec: Log records of valuable training data that might help you improve your skills.
infotexts.entitydescription.Touhou_Aya_Token: Using it greatly enhance physical capabilities. Only functional for Tengus.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Medical_Eff: You feel as if your knowledge slips away.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Scarlet_Long_Night: What you say may unintentionally change the fate of those around you.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Touhou_Aya_Camera_: Feels as if your very soul is frozen.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal01: Damage caused is increased due to concentrated power.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal02: You can feel your body become lighter.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Sun_Flower_Petal03: The power of the Flowers of Life grant you damage resistance.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Unconfirmed_Fantas: She seems to enjoy making people scared and afraid, making up legends about herself.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Nue_Weapons: The Yokai at the Myouren Temple revolve around the Holy White Lotus. As a new member, she seems to be a little out of touch with them.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Flandre_Weapons: TL note: For some reason this repeats Flandre's introduction.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Destruction_Of_Mu: Most creatures have this thing called "eyes." If you want to incapacitate one, apply some force to it and it will be easily destroyed.
infotexts.afflictionname.Unconfirmed_Fantasy_Flyin: The Nightmare of the Heian Period
infotexts.afflictiondescription.Unconfirmed_Fantas: While HP is below 50%, damage resistance is increased.
infotexts.talentname.Lord_Of_Flowers: Lord of the Four Season Flowers
infotexts.talentdescription.Lord_Of_Flowers:
While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Yuuka's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Melee Damage is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. 
Each round, receive a Sunflower Seed that randomly drops different petals. Each petal provides bonuses after use. 
Can block incoming projectiles with the Parasol.
infotexts.talentdescription.NueTalent:
While wearing ‖color:52,94,60,255‖Nue's Outfit+:‖end‖ 
Debuff Resistance is massively increased. 
Buff duration is reduced by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. 
Movement speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ when HP is below 50% 
Resistance to debuffs, physical injuries and burn is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖15%‖end‖ when HP is below 50% 
When you kill [amount] enemies, you'll receive bonuses that depend on the amount of enemies killed. 156个：Skill acquisition speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Movement speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 312个：Experience gained is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖20%‖end‖. Max health is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 468个：Duration of buffs is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖. Attack speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖10%‖end‖. 624个：Attack damage is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖25%‖end‖. Swimming speed is increased by ‖color:gui.green‖50%‖end‖.
infotexts.afflictioncauseofdeathself.Destruction_O: Shattered and destroyed to the roots.
infotexts.missiondescription.FindHoujuuNue: UFO Romance in the Night Sky
infotexts.missionmessage.FindHoujuuNue: "Did you know the distance between Earth and its moon is 380,000 kilometers? Humans once launched a satellite called "Torifune", which is now stuck at the halfway point. \nIt used to carry various animals and plants to gather data about terraforming, but due to an unexplained computer failure, it became static, forming a triangle between the moon and earth. \nAs to what happened to the life inside, a certain Yokai claims the ecosystem has mutated, but nobody knows for certain.
infotexts.missiondescription.Touhou_OutpostDestroy: A group of ignorants were overcome with temptation and attempted to surpass the limits of their bodies, degenerating into demonic monsters. \n For Gensokyo's peace sake, an anonymous sage has offered you 10,000 MK to deal with them and detonate the reactor to erase any evidence of such a disgrace.
infotexts.missionmessage.Touhou_OutpostDestroyMiss: It's a sin for a human to attempt something so outrageous. Shiki will surely have some words with them.
infotexts.missiondescription.Salvage_Mysterious_Pe: Some crews have reported seeing flashes of light of unknown origin in a nearby ruin. We'll send your crew to investigate what's going on.
infotexts.missionmessage.Salvage_Mysterious_Pearl_: The source of the light turned out to be magical pearls. Akyuu will probably have something to say.
infotexts.missiondescription.Salvage_Mysterious_Pe: Miners spotted strange flashes deep inside a cave and went to investigate, but we have lost contact. We'll pay you well to find out what happened.
infotexts.missiondescription.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Cra: Maliciously infested lifeforms are hiding in a cave nearby. In order to prevent the spread of this infection, the nest must be purged.
infotexts.missionmessage.Clear_Reiki_Erode_Crawler: The potential mutation was successfully eradicated.
